column4: why when I update my lucid it say in need to do partial upgrade?
do i need to upgrade? i got no issue with lucid.
the "sudo aptitude safe-upgrade" doesn't upgrade your system to new version!  it safely updates your current system.

DON'T do partial upgrades!  Install and use "aptitude" and use the command "sudo aptitude safe-upgrade" to install what can be upgraded.  "partial upgrade" really means, 'it's going to break your system'
